name: HopOnHopOff
description:
Made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 in a week (the few hours that I had)

Theme On/Off

Time is money and the stingy scrooge in you cheeped out on the holiday in London.
You have one day and one tourbus ticket and you are going to get worth every cent you payed! Too bad that the bus seems always to leave when you arrive at the stop.
Oh, well you'll have to run for a bit then.

Controls:


KeyArrowNumpadJumpSup5Left StepAleft
4Right StepDright6

Sources:

Audio from the provided Jam Resources.
